channel.title: Mega Uber Simple AutoTalker

item.title: Mega Uber Simple AutoTalker
item.dc:creator: @R1ch4y R1ch4y
item.description:
@R1ch4y wrote:

Ok, all this script does is repeat what you want typed. It doesn’t have any anti-ban, it does what it says on the tin, and that is AutoTalk. Oh yeah, I forgot, there is one type of anti-ban…It uses TypeSend, instead of StendKeys. Other than, no anti-ban.

I’m not responsible if this gets you banned. You’ve been warned.

[code]program UberSimpleAutoTalker;
//By R1ch4 of SRl, Gzp and Mopar.

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

begin

repeat

TypeSend(‘Your text here.’);

until(false);

end.
[/code]

See what I mean by simple?

Enjoy!

Read full topic
